title.@value: Pedal cycle as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event

definition.@value: A pedal-cycle is any land transport vehicle propelled by the muscular energy of the person(s) on that vehicle usually by means of a pedal system but sometimes by lever(s) or handle(s). Includes vehicles with two wheels (the usual number) or more.

label.@value: Pedal cycle as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event
